Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.title: Call Me Mrs. Sprayfoam
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.description: A catchy jingle about Mrs. Sprayfoam - the queen of insulation services!
Call-Me-Mrs.Sprayfoam.mp3.ad_copy: Looking for top-notch spray foam insulation? Call Mrs. Sprayfoam today!
fun_facts: This track was made for SprayFoamRadio.com
Mrs. Sprayfoam knows her R-values better than anyone

Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.title: Espuma y Calidez 2
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.description: Spanish-language track about foam and warmth - the sequel that slaps even harder!
Espuma-Calidez-2.mp3.ad_copy: Espuma para tu hogar - comfort in every spray!
fun_facts: Calidez means warmth - perfect for insulation vibes

Foam-Everything.mp3.title: Foam Everything
Foam-Everything.mp3.description: An anthem for spray foam enthusiasts - if it can be foamed, FOAM IT!
Foam-Everything.mp3.ad_copy: Walls, ceilings, crawl spaces - foam everything for maximum efficiency!
fun_facts: Spray foam can expand up to 100x its original volume

Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.title: Foam It - We Insulate You Right
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.description: Professional service anthem - trust the foam pros!
Foam-It-we-insulate-you-right.mp3.ad_copy: Professional spray foam insulation done right, the first time!
fun_facts: Proper insulation can cut energy bills by 50%
This is the official contractor anthem

Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.title: Hey Diddle Diddle
Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.description: A playful nursery rhyme remix with a sprayfoam twist!
Hey-Diddle-Diddle.mp3.ad_copy: Hey diddle diddle, foam in the middle - insulate your home from floor to ceiling!
fun_facts: Even nursery rhymes need good insulation
The cow jumped over the moon because its barn was too hot - shoulda used spray foam

OG-Polyurthane-gang.mp3.title: OG Polyurethane Gang
OG-Polyurthane-gang.mp3.description: Hardcore track for the real spray foam OGs - polyurethane pride!
OG-Polyurthane-gang.mp3.ad_copy: Polyurethane - the original gangster of insulation materials!
fun_facts: This track is for contractors who've been foaming since day one

Polyurethane-Gang.mp3.title: Polyurethane Gang
Polyurethane-Gang.mp3.description: Another banger for the polyurethane crew - rep your foam!
Polyurethane-Gang.mp3.ad_copy: Join the Polyurethane Gang - superior insulation, superior results!
fun_facts: Closed-cell polyurethane has an R-value of about 6.5 per inch

Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.title: Comfy Life (Spanish Version)
Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.description: La vida comoda - living that comfortable, well-insulated life en espa√±ol!
Spanish-ComfyLife.mp3.ad_copy: Viva la vida comoda - spray foam for the comfortable life!
fun_facts: Spray foam insulation is popular worldwide
This track brings the Latin flavor to the foam game
